import math
i = int(input())
x = 0
list1 = []
while x < i:
    oo = input().split()
    nd = int(oo[0]) / int(oo[1])
    if nd % 1 > 0:
        nd = math.floor(nd) + 1
    list1.append(int(nd))
    x = x + 1
for ele in list1:
    print(ele)
